settings.heading: Food Is love
settings.text: Ekam Organics nourishes your mind, body, and soul by providing freshly prepared, organic food and beverages, allowing you to devote more time to all elements of your “primary health” (family, spirituality, exercise, friendships, intimacy, etc).

settings.heading: Food as medicine
settings.text: Ekam Organics was founded on the principle that food has the ability to function as medicine. Eating organic, whole foods that are rich in antioxidants has been shown to increase happiness and produce a radiant appearance on the inside and out.
